originalTitle: Kenyan charged with luring young men to fight for Russia in Ukraine
title: Kenyan charged with luring young men to fight for Russia in Ukraine
content: A total of 1,000 Kenyans have reportedly been recruited to fight for Russia in its war against Ukraine.

originalTitle: Girl, 14, shot dead as South Africa's 'taxi wars' hit school
title: Girl, 14, shot dead as South Africa's 'taxi wars' hit school
content: Violence has plagued South Africa's highly competitive and lucrative taxi industry for decades.

originalTitle: Is Ethiopia heading back to war in Tigray?
title: Is Ethiopia heading back to war in Tigray?
content: Many people are again leaving the region of Tigray just over three years after the civil war there ended.

originalTitle: Why are many Western leaders visiting China?
title: Why are many Western leaders visiting China?
content: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz is in Beijing, saying he wants to reset ties.

originalTitle: Ecuador hikes tariffs on Colombian imports to 50 percent starting March 1
title: Ecuador hikes tariffs on Colombian imports to 50 percent starting March 1
content: The new announcement from Quito follows an initial 30 percent tariff imposed by the Andean nation in early February.

originalTitle: Israeli attacks on Lebanon’s Bekaa Valley kill Syrian teenager
title: Israeli attacks on Lebanon’s Bekaa Valley kill Syrian teenager
content: One killed and 29 others wounded in latest Israeli attack in violation of ceasefire.

originalTitle: American citizen among those killed in Cuba boat shooting, US official says
title: American citizen among those killed in Cuba boat shooting, US official says
content: Cuba has accused those on board of planning "an infiltration with terrorist aims” and firing first.

originalTitle: US-Iran talks end after 'significant progress', mediator says
title: US-Iran talks end after 'significant progress', mediator says
content: The indirect negotiations in Geneva are seen as a last-ditch effort, but the chances of a nuclear agreement are unclear.

originalTitle: Pakistan says two soldiers killed after attacks by Afghan Taliban
title: Pakistan says two soldiers killed after attacks by Afghan Taliban
content: Both sides claim to have inflicted heavy losses after the Afghan Taliban launched attacks along the border.

originalTitle: Out of Europe - now Celtic face critical fortnight
title: Out of Europe - now Celtic face critical fortnight
content: After exiting the Europa League, Celtic face a season-defining fortnight in the fight for the league and Scottish Cup.

originalTitle: Sacking Amorim could cost Man Utd nearly £16m
title: Sacking Amorim could cost Man Utd nearly £16m
content: Ruben Amorim's 14 months in charge of Manchester United have come at a price, with the club now paying up to £15.9m to sack him, in addition to £11m to hire the Portuguese.

originalTitle: Sutton's predictions v Oli Fox of Good Neighbours
title: Sutton's predictions v Oli Fox of Good Neighbours
content: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on Oli Fox from indie band Good Neighbours, plus the BBC readers and AI with his predictions for this weekend's Premier League fixtures.
